name: Liquid Staking Index
description: What is the project about? Liquid staking index is a Carbon native index comprising of governance tokens of top liquid staking protocols. This is to provide a single trading instrument for traders, to enable them to go long or short on top liquid staking protocols with one click. What makes your project unique? This is the first ever Liquid Staking Index in the crypto space making it stand out as a unique asset. History of your project. The index was launched in May 2022 by the Carbon network with the price of the index starting at $100 at the time of the launch. Demex, a DEX on the Carbon Network launched the LSI perpetuals market to enable trading of the asset. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Carbon network will launch more niche and exotic indexes for traders. What can your token be used for?
